actions.committee: Senate Committee on Agriculture and Forestry
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Agriculture and Forestry.

official_title: A bill to amend section 22 of the Federal Meat Inspection Act relating to punishment for the commission of certain offenses under such act.

summary.text: Provides, under the Federal Meat Inspection Act, that persons within the jurisdiction of such Act shall be subject to specified penalties for offering gifts to Federal meat inspectors. Eliminates the requirement that such gifts be offered with the intent to influence such inspectors.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 22 of the Federal Meat Inspection Act relating to punishment for the commission of certain offenses under such act.
